text: Diniyandian o Allah so miyamaratiyaya a manga mama, go so miyamaratiyaya a manga babay, sa manga sorga a pphamangondas ko kababaan iyan so manga lawasayg, makakakal siran roo, go manga darpa a manga pipiya sii ko manga sorga a tatap. Go kasosoat a phoon ko Allah a lawan roo pn: Giyoto man na skaniyan so daag a mala
